title: RaTEScore: A Metric for Radiology Report Generation
details: W Zhao, C Wu, X Zhang, Y Zhang, Y Wang, W Xie - medRxiv, 2024
abstract: This paper introduces a novel, entity-aware metric, termed as Radiological Report (Text) Evaluation (RaTEScore), to assess the quality of medical reports generated by AI models. RaTEScore emphasizes crucial medical entities such as diagnostic …
